shifts.description: Help set up vendor booths, signage, and festival areas

shifts.name: Morning Shift
shifts.description: Assist with vendor check-in, parking, and morning activities

roles.description: Support cornhole tournament, pageant, and workshop activities

roles.name: Event Photography
roles.description: Capture festival moments for social media and archives
